DECLARE @baseKeyCol VARCHAR(1000) = '[name], superName,'
DECLARE @tableOrViewSchema VARCHAR(255) = 'stage1'
DECLARE @tableOrViewName VARCHAR(255) = 'vw_marvel_hero_base'
DECLARE @fqViewName VARCHAR(512) = CONCAT_WS('.',@tableOrViewSchema,@tableOrViewName)
DECLARE @baseAlias VARCHAR(10) = 'vmhb'
DECLARE @newLine VARCHAR(2) = CHAR(13) + CHAR(10)
DECLARE @dropStatement VARCHAR(MAX) =
    'IF OBJECT_ID(''' + @fqViewName + ''') IS NOT NULL ' + @newLine +
    '   DROP VIEW ' + @fqViewName + @newLine +
    ' GO ' + @newLine + @newLine
DECLARE @createStatement VARCHAR(500) = 'CREATE VIEW ' + @fqViewName + ' AS ' + @newLine

PRINT @dropStatement

;WITH JsonFields AS (
    SELECT C.COLUMN_NAME, LEFT(C.COLUMN_NAME, 2) AS jAlias ,
        REPLACE(@tableOrViewName,'_base','_' + C.COLUMN_NAME) AS NewViewName
    FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS C 
    WHERE C.TABLE_SCHEMA = @tableOrViewSchema
        AND C.TABLE_NAME = @tableOrViewName
        AND C.DATA_TYPE = 'NVARCHAR'
        AND C.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH = -1
        AND C.CHARACTER_SET_NAME = 'UNICODE'
)

SELECT CONCAT_WS(
    ' '
    ,@dropStatement
    ,@createStatement
    ,'SELECT'
    ,@baseKeyCol
    ,'jCol.[value] AS ' + jf.COLUMN_NAME + @newLine
    ,'FROM'
    ,CONCAT_WS('.', @tableOrViewSchema, @tableOrViewName)
    ,@baseAlias + @newLine
    ,'CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(' + CONCAT_WS('.',@baseAlias,jf.COLUMN_NAME) + ')' + @newLine
    ,'WITH ([value] VARCHAR(256) ''$'') AS jCol' + @newLine
    ,'GO' + @newLine + @newLine
)
FROM JsonFields jf
